All Classes

Class Description
ActionCard
Action Card inherit from Card.
Card
Definition of a Uno Card, including its color, number, and/or action Number Cards have a color and a number.
Card.Action  
Card.Color  
Card.Number  
Card.Wild  
CardBoxCenter
Declaration of center window of scene.
CardBoxLeft
Declaration of left window of scene.
CardBoxRight
Declaration of right window of scene.
CardBoxTop
Declaration of top window of scene.
CardImageView
CardImageView sets the current type of uno card in the CardBox.
Dealer
Dealer generates a list of cards for each class player from the shuffled card deck.
HumanCardBox
Box for human player.
NumberCard
Number Card inherits everything from Card.
PlayCard  
Player
This class represent a player of the uno game.
PlayUno  
RulesForFX
Game rules for FX user interface.
RulesHuman
This class represents all game rules.
ShowOtherVersions
Test without FX user interface.
UnoDeck
UnoDeck generates a unique Deck of cards.
UnoFX
This class implements a starter user interface with 3 computer and one human player.
UnoFXAllInOne
This Class implements starting point of user interface and the first move of a computer player Declaration User Interface includes emoji, player's uno cards, top card and card deck in the middle First move is to draw a card.
UserEventHandler
Class implements mouse click event in order to choose a card the user intends to play.
WildCard
